snippet.title: 1 Year Developing my Dream Indie Game | Devlog 1
snippet.description:
Hey everyone! Welcome to the first devlog for my pixel art survival sandbox I'm developing using Unity. I'm Peter, I'm 15, and for the past year I've been working on my first indie game in my free time. In this video, I show off the core features of my game, and give some insight into the history of the project. I also focus a bit on the coding, giving some potentially useful tips on one method of implementing infinite procedural world generation. Hope you enjoy! 💻


🙋‍♂️ Support the channel by subscribing!
https://www.youtube.com/@sigmoiddev

🎬 Watch the rest of the series!
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLdCLXFnLGVkAp9dh9vQI5v0Pg78-CMXMy


📖 Chapters:
0:00 - Intro
0:28 - Background
1:23 - About my Game
2:20 - Procedural Generation
3:57 - Future Devlogs
4:39 - Outro


🎶 Music:
Lakey Inspired - Chill Day | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3HjG1Y4QpVA
Lakey Inspired - Better Days | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RXLzvo6kvVQ
Artificial Music - And So It Begins | https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vk8QSqPC5TA
